definition: (out of) the corner of one's eyes/peripheral vision/residual light/light of the setting sun
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: I was sitting in my office and saw it out of the corner of my eye.
sentences.chinese: 我正坐在办公室里，c从眼角余光发现了它。

sentences.english: Out of the corner of my eye, I saw a baby playing with rattles on my mother’s bed.
sentences.chinese: 我眼角余光看到一个小孩在妈妈的床上玩拨浪鼓。

sentences.english: Thus peripheral vision is up to the non-treated eye.
sentences.chinese: 因此，余光是由那一只没有接受治疗的眼睛来提供的。

sentences.english: From the corner of his eyes, Jack saw a flash outside the window. Hensley saw it, too.
sentences.chinese: 杰克眼角的余光瞥到窗外有道闪光，汉斯莱也看见了。

sentences.english: I don’t think they know my peripheral vision extends to the door.
sentences.chinese: 我认为他们不知道我的余光看到了他们。

sentences.english: The sun is starting to set, turning cloud wisps neon red in the dimming light.
sentences.chinese: 太阳就要落下去了，余光将云微微的变成红色。

sentences.english: And out of the corner of your eye, you see enemy planes approaching.
sentences.chinese: 你余光一扫，发现数架敌机正向你逼近。

sentences.english: Yu Kuang Chung has just written a poem.
sentences.chinese: 余光中刚刚写了一首诗。

sentences.english: He stared up at her, blinking in the glow of the dying camp fire.
sentences.chinese: 他抬眼盯着她，在篝火的余光中眨着眼睛。

sentences.english: Your eyes will catch those first and last words too, by using something called the peripheral vision.
sentences.chinese: 用眼睛的余光你会看到开头和结尾的几个字。

sentences.english: I turned out to get a scan.
sentences.chinese: 我熟视无睹地拿余光一扫而过。

sentences.english: Ten sport poems are found after perusing every piece of Kwang-Chung Yu's poems.
sentences.chinese: 笔者耙梳余光中全部诗作，发现十首运动诗。

definition: outer or inner corner of the eye/canthus
to shoot a glance/glance/to appear in a flash
to take aim/(fig.) to aim one's looks at/to glance at
to take a furtive look at
to run one's eyes over/to sweep one's eyes over
to turn one's head/in no time/in the twinkling of an eye
to turn one's head/to turn around
to throw a glance at/to peer at/Taiwan pr. [jun4]
